document_data.name: Little Gate
document_data.mainbody: The '''Little Gate''' was the most southern entrance into the city of [[Dhaztanar]] in [[Semphar]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Little Gate was located in the far southeastern section of the [[Furdah Rustauk District]] in southern Dhaztanar on the [[Street of the Murgh√¥m Merchants]]. Aside from the harbor on [[Gbor Nor]], it provided one of only two entry points through the walls of this district from outside of Dhaztanar.
